Description:
Adversaries may look for details about the network configuration and settings of systems they access or through information discovery of remote systems

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - SharpView Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where original_file_name = 'sharpview.exe' and process_path like '%\sharpview.exe' and (command like '%add-remoteconnection%' or command like '%convert-adname%' or command like '%convertfrom-sid%' or command like '%convertfrom-uacvalue%' or command like '%convert-sidtoname%' or command like '%export-powerviewcsv%' or command like '%find-domainobjectpropertyoutlier%' or command like '%find-domainprocess%' or command like '%find-domainshare%' or command like '%find-domainuserevent%' or command like '%find-domainuserlocation%' or command like '%find-foreigngroup%' or command like '%find-foreignuser%' or command like '%find-gpocomputeradmin%' or command like '%find-gpolocation%' or command like '%find-interesting%' or command like '%find-localadminaccess%' or command like '%find-managedsecuritygroups%' or command like '%get-cachedrdpconnection%' or command like '%get-dfsshare%' or command like '%get-domaincomputer%' or command like '%get-domaincontroller%' or command like '%get-domaindfsshare%' or command like '%get-domaindnsrecord%' or command like '%get-domainfileserver%' or command like '%get-domainforeign%' or command like '%get-domaingpo%' or command like '%get-domaingroup%' or command like '%get-domainguidmap%' or command like '%get-domainmanagedsecuritygroup%' or command like '%get-domainobject%' or command like '%get-domainou%' or command like '%get-domainpolicy%' or command like '%get-domainsid%' or command like '%get-domainsite%' or command like '%get-domainspnticket%' or command like '%get-domainsubnet%' or command like '%get-domaintrust%' or command like '%get-domainuserevent%' or command like '%get-forestdomain%' or command like '%get-forestglobalcatalog%' or command like '%get-foresttrust%' or command like '%get-gpttmpl%' or command like '%get-groupsxml%' or command like '%get-lastloggedon%' or command like '%get-loggedonlocal%' or command like '%get-netcomputer%' or command like '%get-netdomain%' or command like '%get-netfileserver%' or command like '%get-netforest%' or command like '%get-netgpo%' or command like '%get-netgroupmember%' or command like '%get-netlocalgroup%' or command like '%get-netloggedon%' or command like '%get-netou%' or command like '%get-netprocess%' or command like '%get-netrdpsession%' or command like '%get-netsession%' or command like '%get-netshare%' or command like '%get-netsite%' or command like '%get-netsubnet%' or command like '%get-netuser%' or command like '%get-pathacl%' or command like '%get-principalcontext%' or command like '%get-registrymounteddrive%' or command like '%get-regloggedon%' or command like '%get-wmiregcachedrdpconnection%' or command like '%get-wmireglastloggedon%' or command like
